instructions.heading: How to use this app
instructions.text:
Welcome!

In this app, you're going to learn the dance "Side to side".

First, you'll have 12 minutes to learn the dance. Try your best to memorize and become as fluent and confident with the dance as you can.

After that, you'll record a video of yourself performing the dance.

Remember, we are rewarding participants who put in great effort to learn the dances. So try your best!

When you're ready, close this dialog and click 'Begin'!

activities.title: Fast Preview
activities.startInstruction: Here's a sped-up version of the dance
activities.endInstruction: Click a button below to continue

activities.title: Slow Preview
activities.startInstruction: Here's the dance at a normal speed
activities.endInstruction:
Preview complete!
Next, you'll practice this dance at 0.5x speed

activities.title: Follow along
activities.startInstruction: Now let's practice without any reminders
activities.endInstruction: Keep working on it and make use of all the time you have left!

activities.title: Practice
activities.startInstruction: Try practicing this without the video!
activities.endInstruction: Keep working on it and make use of all the time you have left!

activities.title: Record / Review
activities.startInstruction: This part is optional - if you'd like to see how you look, record it and review it now! This recording is just for practice and won't be uploaded.
activities.endInstruction: Keep working on it and make use of all the time you have left!

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording a video of you performing the dance. The music will be played at half speed, just like you practiced.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

upload.prompt: Show us what you've learned so far!

instructions.text:

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording a video of you performing the dance. The music will be played at half speed, just like you practiced.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording a video of you performing the dance. The music will be played at half speed, just like you practiced.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording a video of you performing the dance. The music will be played at half speed, just like you practiced.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording a video of you performing the dance. The music will be played at half speed, just like you practiced.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

First, you'll have 12 minutes to learn the dance. Try your best to memorize and become as fluent and confident with the dance as you can.

After that, you'll record a video of yourself performing the dance.

Remember, we are rewarding participants who put in great effort to learn the dances. So try your best!

When you're ready, close this dialog and click 'Begin'!

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording a video of you performing the dance. The music will be played at half speed, just like you practiced.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

First, you'll have 12 minutes to learn the dance. Try your best to memorize and become as fluent and confident with the dance as you can.

After that, you'll record a video of yourself performing the dance.

Remember, we are rewarding participants who put in great effort to learn the dances. So try your best!

When you're ready, close this dialog and click 'Begin'!

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording a video of you performing the dance. The music will be played at half speed, just like you practiced.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

instructions.heading: Recording & uploading your performance
instructions.text:
Congrats on your progress learning the dance!

Now, we ask you to share what you've learned with us by recording a video of you performing the dance. The music will be played at half speed, just like you practiced.

Don't worry if you aren't perfect or struggle with the dance. Do you're best and show us what you've learned so far!

PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE IN THE VIDEO FRAME AND THAT MUSIC IS AUDIBLE IN THE RECORDINGS. Please take headphones off and play the music through speakers so that it comes through in the recording.

If a glitch happens or you're not happy with your initial recordings, you'll have one opportunity to re-record.

upload.prompt: Show us what you've learned so far!

instructions.heading: How to use this app
instructions.text:
Welcome!

In this app, you're going to learn the dance "Pajama Party".

First, you'll have 12 minutes to learn the dance. Try your best to memorize and become as fluent and confident with the dance as you can.

After that, you'll record a video of yourself performing the dance.

Remember, we are rewarding participants who put in great effort to learn the dances. So try your best!

When you're ready, close this dialog and click 'Begin'!
